On long, dark winter nights, folk at the edges of civilization have learned to be wary of old women who come knocking at their door. They look for her tracks in the snow and other telltale signs to make sure she isn't a winter hag who plans to drag them off and feast on their bones. In truth, winter hags are more subtle monsters, entrapping humanoids in schemes that create mistrust and anger within a village before picking off the residents one or two at a time, heightening the fear and anger of those who remain. When her work is done, a winter hag revels in the silence of a frost-rimed village in which no hearth fires are left burning. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Winter Hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1187) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 129 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), snow vision **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +17, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +4 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +6 **[Coven](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=11)** A winter hag adds [_cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [_solid fog_](/Spells.aspx?ID=290), and [_wall of ice_](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) to her coven's spells.
**Snow Vision** Snow doesn't impair a winter hag's vision; she ignores [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from snowfall. --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +14 **Ref** +13 **Will** +16 **HP** 145 **Immunities** cold **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5, fire 5 --- **Speed** 25 feet; ice climb 25 feet **Melee** _ice staff_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 2d4+7 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold **Melee** claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d6+7 slashing plus 1d6 cold **Occult Innate Spells** DC 25, attack +17 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245) - **3rd** [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) (at will), [Ice Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=695) - **Constant (4th)** [Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) **Craft Ice Staff** ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Downtime](/Traits.aspx?ID=49), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A winter hag can spend 1 day performing a specific ritual to create a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_ of black ice. Once per day, she can use the staff to cast [_cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47). The staff's magic functions only in the hands of the hag who created it; for anyone else, it is a mundane staff. If the hag dies or if the staff remains in another creature's possession for 24 hours, the staff melts into a puddle of foul-smelling water. **Ice Climb** A winter hag can [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) at the listed Speed, but only on ice. She ignores difficult terrain from ice and snow, and she doesn't risk falling when crossing ice.
